programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Adam learns Jessica made a police report against Shen Yang and tries to get her to withdraw it. James tries to give Louis advice for his business but is rebuffed. Matthew is devastated when he learns about the complication that arose from his surgery.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: (Encore) Primary One registration has long been a source of stress for many parents in Singapore. Steve Chia finds out how competitive the process has become over the years and how fair it is for all.

programme.title: Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: A Japanese sports entertainment television series in which 100 competitors attempt to complete an obstacle course.

programme.title: Food Chase
programme.desc: Alan Wan, Yuslina Yussof, James Kumar, and Oon Shu An are taking on Food Chase in Beach Road. While the cast from The Cheaters App may not doing any cheating today, one team will definitely be downing The Drink.

programme.title: Mata Mata
programme.desc: 1949, the Japanese Occupation is over, Singapore has returned to British control, but the people are still struggling to pick up the pieces of their lives. 19 year-old Elizabeth Lee (Cheryl Wee) has just finished her Senior Cambridge exams and her mother, Yoke Lien (Aileen Tan) gives her two choices: find a job or get married. However, Elizabeth's gets into a scuffle with gangsters, catching the attention of secret society member Lim Seng Hock (Daren Tan) and British officer Henry Ridley.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Vietnam
programme.desc: Continuing in Sapa, Luke ventures beyond the main town and visits the local villages where he delves into some rich local traditions. Luke prepares a dish in the clouds with local Su May in her village, Ta Phin. Here, they cook field mushrooms gathered in the early morning. He cooks a pork-skewer dish in front of a beautiful waterfall in the heart of Cat Cat village, and learns how the local Mong people eat, sharing a communal salmon hot pot that he prepares on the porch of a local home.

programme.title: United Plates Of America S1
programme.desc: Host Gary Takle travels to the big cities of The USA to discover the underlying food culture that exists in every town.

programme.title: Weird, True & Freaky
programme.desc: Weird, True & Freaky reveals the world's most unbelievable and scariest animal encounters ever. Prepare to witness nature's most terrifying confrontations gone horribly wrong. Bizarre, alien-like beasts prove that in the animal kingdom, anything is possible. From creatures of the deep entering our lives, to deformed animals fighting to overcome any obstacle, the extraordinary beings keep coming.

programme.title: Animal Rescue
programme.desc: A new megabeast covers an entire village with mud and hides in the mud. Then it operates in full power for a sudden attack. Rody and his team fight against this muddy megabeast. They realized that this muddy village is a market for illegally poached animals. And finally they find Rody's mom helping out captured animals to escape.

programme.title: Animal Rescue
programme.desc: A wild tiger appears in the city and causes trouble. Tasha and Benny notice that the tiger looks similar to their friend Sunny. No way, Sunny is dead! At that moment, the beast egg captures the tiger. The rescue signal goes off and the Animal Rescue team has to go without concluding whether the tiger is Sunny or not.

programme.title: Nature Cat S3
programme.desc: Get ready, gang, it's time for Nature Cat's annual Summer Fest - summer fun, the whole day long. Whoo hooo! First up is their Summer Fest Sprinkler Frolic, followed by Summer Fest Bike Ride and Summer Fest Kickball game. Nothing can ruin their wonderful Summer Fest, except for the super tall dark clouds approaching and the ominous cool breeze. A thunderstorm! But wait a tick, what is that stuff falling from the sky? Snow in the summertime?

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S3
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and maths.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1
programme.desc: Kai, Lola, Rammy and Bobbi are four heroic young deer that protect the animals who live in Central Forest and the people living in Platinum City.

programme.title: Counting With Paula S5
programme.desc: The children enter a room on the Spaceship without permission and an alien runs loose. They have to find the alien and return it to where it belongs before Mr. Astronaut finds out. However, this alien is really good at hiding! The Wong Brothers, Sue-Mae and the children have an epic sports battle. The girls will do karate and the boys will do gymnastics. Who will win?

programme.title: Tayo the Little Bus S4
programme.desc: Chris the concrete mixer truck always works hard at construction sites without any complaints but feels like he is not getting enough appreciation or recognition for his hard work. He decides to leave the construction site and meet with Frank the fire truck and Iracha the delivery truck with the hope of changing his job to something that will gain him more recognition from others.

programme.title: Sesame Street S48
programme.desc: Catch a brand new segment starring Cookie Monster in "Cookie Monster's Foodie Truck". And look out for special guest appearances by international Sesame Street characters Chamki (from Galli Galli Sim Sim), Lily (from Zhima Jie: Da Niao Kan Shijie) and Zuzu (from Takalani Sesame).

programme.title: Paw Patrol S7
programme.desc: Led by a boy named Ryder, a team of six playful rescue dogs use their individual talents to protect the seaside town of Adventure Bay. The pups are occasionally joined by newer helpers: Cap'n Turbot, Robo-Dog, Everest, and Tracker.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S7
programme.desc: The gang are putting on a performance of Wizard of Ollipolis at the town theatre. The Imp wants the lead role badly and thinks stealing Cherry's ruby red trainers will help him win the role. A small stumble throws him into stupor where he is now the Wizard! The Imp litters off his fishing boat and causes a river of trash that infects the town water supply. Can the gang help the Imp to see that his actions have rippling consequences?

programme.title: Tall Tales

However, Alice is prisoner of another terrible enemy: the Queen of Hearts...

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series S23
programme.desc: Ash and Goh visit the Galar region and meet a small Pokemon with a big heart!

programme.title: 左撇子妻子

programme.title: 离地自由行 –非洲
programme.desc: (PG) 袁学谦(Benedict)进行28日的东非之旅，由坦桑尼亚出发，寻找电影《铁达尼号》中的坦桑石「海洋之心」；以Glamping方式，近距离与万兽之王共处一室；以开篷四驱车、热气球、步行探险多种玩法，穿梭野生动物保护区；当然少不了以航拍角度，离地俯瞰壮观的非洲大地。他一路向南，走进彩虹之国南非，前往被喻为世界最危险城市之一的约翰内斯堡，探索非洲白人的奢华，以及奴隶主义之后，非洲黑人的压抑生活；并在南非行政首都Pretoria，以全世界其中一种最贵的火车游方式，直奔度假胜地开普敦，欣赏世界自然奇观，.

programme.title: 翻新援助行动
programme.desc: 家中不太理想的生活条件让作为全家唯一的照顾者宝凤成为挑战。我们的室内设计师伟良能否为她翻新改造房子，为他们一家的生活注入新的活力？.

programme.title: 爱的救援
